Title: Infor Visual Integration
Description: Details on integration with Infor Visual ERP.

Topics.Title: Visual Connection
Topics.Summary: How the application connects to Infor Visual.
Topics.Content:
Infor Visual Connection

The MTM WIP Application integrates directly with your Infor Visual ERP system to validate parts, locations, and operations in real-time.

What is Validated

  • Parts: Part numbers are validated against the Infor Visual part master to ensure they exist and are active.
  • Locations: Locations are verified to exist in Visual's location master.
  • Operations: Operation codes are validated for manufacturing routing.

Connection Status

The status bar at the bottom of the application shows the connection status to Infor Visual. A green indicator means the connection is active.

Topics.Title: Visual Dashboard
Topics.Summary: View Infor Visual data in real-time.
Topics.Content:
Visual Dashboard

Access live data from Infor Visual through the integrated dashboard.

Available Categories

  • Inventory: View current inventory levels and locations.
  • Receiving: Track incoming shipments and PO status.
  • Shipping: Monitor outbound shipments.
  • Inventory Auditing: Tools for verifying inventory accuracy.
  • Die/Tool Discovery: Locate dies and tools in the facility.
  • Material Handler Analytics: Performance metrics for material handlers.

Accessing the Dashboard

  1. Navigate to Menu > Infor Visual > Dashboard.
  2. Select a category from the sidebar.
  3. Use filters to narrow down the data view.

Note: Dashboard data is read-only. To modify Visual data, use the appropriate Visual application.

Topics.Title: Purchase Order Details
Topics.Content:
Purchase Order Details

View detailed information about Purchase Orders from Infor Visual.

Information Displayed

  • PO Number: The unique purchase order identifier.
  • Vendor: The supplier associated with the PO.
  • Line Items: List of items, quantities, and due dates.
  • Status: Current status of the PO (Open, Closed, Received).
